name: Shadow Fey Ambassador
description: The Shadow Fey Ambassador embodies a dark and charismatic presence, capable of manipulating shadows and social dynamics with finesse.
memorable: It combines physical prowess with deep social manipulation, instilling fear and charm simultaneously.
goals: To manipulate social interactions and dominate encounters through fear and persuasion.
relations: May be found serving powerful fey or working alongside other manipulators and tricksters.
environment: Commonly associated with shadowy locales, fey courts, or dark dealings.
strengths: Exceptional skills in deception and persuasion, high dexterity and charisma.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks in bright light due to sunlight sensitivity.
attacks: Utilizes a Withering Stare to instill fear and follows up with quick rapier strikes that deal piercing and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Honeyed Words allows it to charm and manipulate multiple targets, making them view it favorably.
skills: Expert in deception with a +13 modifier, alongside strong skills in intimidation and persuasion.
additional_information: Fey Ancestry grants advantage against being charmed.
The Shadow Traveler ability allows it to vanish into shadows and reappear within 30 feet.
Advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks related to shadow magic.
test_queries: charismatic shadow fey with fear abilities
dark creature skilled in deception and intimidation
shadow creature with powerful persuasion skills
